name: Sydney
hint: Australia's largest city, famous for its harbor, Opera House, and Harbour Bridge

name: Melbourne
hint: Australia's second-largest city, known for its culture, coffee, and street art in the state of Victoria

name: Auckland
hint: New Zealand's largest city, built on an isthmus between two harbors, known as the City of Sails

name: Brisbane
hint: The capital of Queensland, Australia, a subtropical city on the Brisbane River

name: Perth
hint: The capital of Western Australia, one of the most isolated major cities in the world

name: Wellington
hint: The capital of New Zealand, the southernmost capital of a sovereign state, known for its wind

name: Adelaide
hint: The capital of South Australia, known for its wine regions, festivals, and planned city layout

name: Christchurch
hint: The largest city on New Zealand's South Island, known as the Garden City

name: Canberra
hint: The capital of Australia, a planned city located inland between Sydney and Melbourne

name: Suva
hint: The capital of Fiji and the largest city in the South Pacific island nations
